#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

char a[455], b[455], c[455];
int dp[455][455][455];
int ans;
int calculate();

int main()
{
	int t;

	cin >> t;

	while (t--)
	{
		cin >> a;
		cin >> b;
		cin >> c;

		ans = calculate();

		cout << ans << endl;

	}

	return 0;
}

int calculate()
{
	int i, j, k, l1, temp;

	l1 = strlen(a);

	for (i = 0; i <= l1; i++)
	{
		for (j = 0; j <= l1; j++)
		{
			for (k = 0; k <= l1; k++)
			{
				if(!i || !j || !k)
					dp[i][j][k] = 0;
				else
				{
					if ((b[j - 1] == a[i - 1]) && (b[j-1]==c[k-1]))
					{
						dp[i][j][k] = dp[i - 1][j - 1][k-1] + 1;
					}
					else
					{
						dp[i][j][k] = max(dp[i - 1][j][k], max(dp[i][j - 1][k],dp[i][j][k-1]));
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	return  (l1 - dp[l1][l1][l1]) * 3;

}
